document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 193''' was released in August of 2011 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.Tavern Profile: The Beached Leviathan:
: ''By [[Craig Campbell]], illustrated by [[Steve Ellis]], Cartography by [[Sean MacDonald]].'' '''p. 1-5'''
This article provides an overview of the [[Beached Leviathan]] tavern.{{Dusup|193/Tavern Profile:The Beached Leviathan}}
document_data.Monster Manual Updates: Kuo-Toa:
: ''By [[Logan Bonner]], illustrated by [[Jason Felix]] and [[Daren Bader]].'' '''p. 30-33'''
This article provides a 4th-edition rules update for the [[kuo-toa]].
document_data.Monster Manual Updates: Sahuagin:
: ''By [[Logan Bonner]], illustrated by [[Christopher Burdett]] and [[Daren Bader]].'' '''p. 34-37'''
This article provides a 4th-edition rules update for the [[sahuagin]].
document_data.The Gauntlgrym Gambit:
: ''By [[Daniel Marthaler]], illustrated by [[Adam Paquette]], [[Jim Nelson]] and [[Eric Belisle]], Cartography by [[Jared Blando]].'' '''p. 38-55'''
An adventure for characters of levels 3-5. Set in [[Gauntlgrym]].{{Dusup|193/The Gauntlgrym Gambit}}
document_data.[[Eye on the Realms]]: The Winking Eyes:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Julie Dillon]].'' '''p. 59-61'''
This article provides an overview of the mysterious [[magic]]al [[gem]]s known as the ''[[Winking Eyes of Rhauron]]''.{{Dusup|193/The Winking Eyes of Rhauron}}
document_data.Shards of Selûne:
: ''By [[Andrew G. Schneider]], illustrated by [[Craig J. Spearing]] and [[Sam Burley]], Cartography by [[Sean MacDonald]].'' '''p. 62-83'''
An adventure for characters of levels 1-3. Set in [[Neverwinter]], related to the ''[[Shards of Selûne]]''.{{Dusup|193/Shards of Selûne}}
